title: How to write a cover letter for a sales position with no sales experience - Quora

response.answer_text: Although you may not have sales experience, you may have other experience that would make you a good sales representative. Some of these skills include: Ability to smile, be friendly and chat with unknown people and large groups, such as working on a newspaper, yearbook, student election, cheer teamCaretaking often requires empathy and ability to follow through with requests for help including day care, babysitting, helping your elderly parent or helping with first aid, or acting as a team leader in scouts or building setting for a playTelephone conversation skills such as polite address, listening and repeating back requests, such as handled on church coordination for a group or acting as the movie organizer for your friendsAbility to memorizeAbility to read a map

Be truthful, explain to them your passion and why you think you will be good for the position. It may not work first time but you will gain insight as to how things work. And if you get to interview, if the answer is still “no” ask for a referral to anyone who could help by giving you and internship. Good luck.
